title: The Grim Reaper - Soul Savior
description:
Description :
        Death comes for every human on Earth ... There was only one difference: not all souls rested in the same place ... There is a Heaven and Hell, also eternal ... And there is a place called " The Middle "which is between them ... This place is completely isolated, it is only for a brief ... the" Death "(Donn), is who get the souls to Earth, and also who forwards them to the right place, following the orders of his superior ... it was an unbreakable cycle, a sovereign law ... Until the "Death" ... created feelings for an earthly soul, a soul with the hours counted ...
